name: Spectacle Space
description:
Spectacle Space is a twin-stick shooter style game that focuses on wave-based combat.

Flip the book around!  Now you are the invader!  Survive the onslaught of planetary defenses to score points and get the highest score!  Fight different and unique enemies as well as bosses to advance through the never-ending waves!

Note: this is the first game I have ever made.  I have tested and had external help testing it, but bugs will likely abound.  Please use the comments or support email to report any bugs and I will do my best to squash them as soon as possible!

Currently supports keyboard and mouse with key rebinding.  Game has only been tested on Windows 10.
